items.title: As GLP-1s become more available, some who aren't overweight may consider using them
items.description: As GLP-1 drugs become more available, some people might use them despite not having excess weight.

items.title: A CrossFit-like race is booming in Asia, and young people are driving the surge
items.description: Hyrox, a timed fitness race that mixes running with workout stations, is selling out across Asia as young people fuel a booming wellness economy.
